itemDescription: Bombay Civil Service employee, British Commissioner for Sind (1831-1893)

wikipedia_page.main: Henry Napier Bruce Erskine (7 September 1831 – 4 December 1893) was a Scottish civil servant who served in the Bombay Civil Service, during British rule in the Indian Subcontinent.He was the Commissioner in Sind from 1879 to 1887.

link_mentions.page: List of commissioners and governors of Sind in British India
